subject: Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race (Alaska)
Dog Sledding
lead_paragraph: Nome, Alaska, prepared for the conclusion of the 1,100-mile Iditarod. The winner was scheduled to arrive late Tuesday or early Wednesday, and it remained a two-man race between the last two to win the Iditarod — Lance Mackey of Fairbanks and the four-time champion Jeff King of Denali Park — who were running a tight race on the last leg.
